name: Georgia A. Popoff
bio: Georgia A. Popoff is an educator and arts-in-education specialist. She has published three poetry collections, most recently Psalter: The Agnostic’s Book of Common Curiosities (Tiger Bark Press, 2015), and is coauthor of a book for teachers on poetry in K-12 classrooms. She serves as a senior editor of Comstock Review and a workshops coordinator and faculty member at the Downtown Writers Center. Popoff lives in Syracuse, New York.
